product.text:
Brer Rabbit Saves His Skin

The classic tale of trickster Brer Rabbit has entertained young readers for decades. In this reprise, Brer Rabbit first tricks Brer Fox into getting stuck in a well. Then, Brer Rabbit tricks Brer Bear by telling him that a hollow tree is filled with honey; when the unsuspecting bear reaches in to retrieve his tasty treat, he finds that the hollow is instead filled with bees. Brer Fox and Brer Bear join forces to outwit their foe, Brer Rabbit, but are dismayed when the clever rabbit foils their plan.

Tie-in Activity: With paper lunch bags, help your child make character hand puppets depicting Brer Rabbit, Brer Fox, and Brer Bear. Use the puppets to reenact scenes from the story.
